net.hudup.core.alg

Class KBaseAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.KBaseAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, KBase, AutoCloseable, Inspectable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BnetKB, KBaseAbstractSerializable, KBaseRecommendIntegrated

    public abstract class KBaseAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
implements KBase
    This abstract implements partially KBase interface by adding a configuration config to configure it and a data source datasource to point to where to locate the dataset from which this knowledge base is learned (trained). Moreover, this class also implements methods load() and save() to load (read) and save (write) knowledge base.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • config

        protected DataConfig config
        The configuration used to customize this knowledge base. The configuration is shared the same with algorithm.

      • datasource

        protected Datasource datasource
        The data source points to where to locate the dataset from which this knowledge base is learned (trained). Please see Datasource for more details.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        This method is used to read KBase from storage system. Storage system can be files, database, etc.
        Specified by:
        load in interface KBase

      • learn

        public void learn(Dataset dataset,
                  Alg alg)
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        This method is responsible for creating KBase or learning from specified dataset. Because every model-based recommender owns distinguished KBase, the second parameter is such algorithm. The association between model-based recommender and KBase is tight. This method tells us that KBase can be learned by any approaches: machine learning, data mining, artificial intelligence, statistics, etc.
        Specified by:
        learn in interface KBase
        Parameters:
        dataset - specified dataset.
        alg - the algorithm that owns this KBase.

      • save

        public void save()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        This method is used to write KBase to storage system according to internal configuration. Storage system can be files, database, etc. This method in turn calls KBase.export(DataConfig) method.
        Specified by:
        save in interface KBase

      • export

        public void export(DataConfig storeConfig)
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        This method is used to write KBase to storage system according to the specified configuration. It is possible to store knowledge base anywhere according to the specified configuration. This method is called by KBase.save() method.
        Specified by:
        export in interface KBase
        Parameters:
        storeConfig - specified configuration where to store knowledge base.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        Cleaning out KBase. This method is stronger than method KBase.close() because it firstly deletes all storage and then calls KBase.close(). Using this method should be careful.
        Specified by:
        clear in interface KBase

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        Close this KBase. After this method is called, KBase becomes empty, which means that method KBase.isEmpty() returns true but KBase can be re-learned by calling the method KBase.learn(Dataset, Alg) again.
        Specified by:
        close in interface KBase
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • getConfig

        public DataConfig getConfig()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        Every KBase always has a configuration represented by DataConfig class. This method returns the internal configuration of KBase.
        Specified by:
        getConfig in interface KBase
        Returns:
        configuration of KBase.

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(DataConfig config)
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        This method is responsible for setting configurations for {code KBase} by specified configuration. These configurations are used by other methods. The typical configuration is uniform resource identifier (URI) indicating where to store KBase, which is used by methods KBase.load() and KBase.save().
        Specified by:
        setConfig in interface KBase
        Parameters:
        config - specified configuration.

      • getDatasource

        public Datasource getDatasource()
        Description copied from interface: KBase
        Data source represented by Datasource class is a special class used to point to a dataset. Of course it contains a URI of such dataset. Note that URI, abbreviation of Uniform Resource Identifier, is the string of characters used to identify a resource on Internet. As usual and for convenience, data source also contains dataset. We can considered data source as a wrapper of dataset with additional information about dataset. This method returns the datasource of the dataset that KBase is learned or loaded. In current implementation, datasource contains dataset but it is possible that datasource does not contains dataset.
        Specified by:
        getDatasource in interface KBase
        Returns:
        datasource of the dataset that KBase is learned or loaded.
